Description: Body sherd of Chian Mature Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior: glazed black; part of lotus flower in added white outline with added red centre above two white bands; traces of two faded bands below; exterior: painted decoration consisting of a part of body and hind legs (with red patches on both and dotted stripe on underbelly) of an animal, possibly a goat, to left; elaborate rosette as filling ornament.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0410) (phase 2)
